short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select anchor tags on a webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Link Lasso is a Chrome extension that makes selecting and copying multiple anchor tags (links) on any webpage quick and easy. Perfect for researchers, marketers, and anyone who needs to gather links efficiently.

Features:

Quickly select and copy multiple links.
- Easy-to-use interface.
- Works on any webpage.
- Save time and enhance your productivity with Link Lasso!
